short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds html to highlighted text in textareas (example XXX)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds html to highlighted text in editable text areas. Useful when web site supports html in comments but doesn't have formatting options.

UPDATE: Added saved messages, you can set these up in options page
